name: CTAngiographyOfChest
title: CT Angiography of Chest
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this LOINC value set is to represent concepts for CT angiography of the chest.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Diagnostic Study.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent CT angiography of the chest with contrast.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes concepts that represent CT angiography of the chest without contrast.)
